import { Link, Outlet, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import AppBar from '@mui/material/AppBar'; import Toolbar from '@mui/material/Toolbar'; import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import InventoryIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Inventory'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Typography } from "@mui/material"; import useUser from "../../hooks/useUser"; const HeaderPage = () => { const location = useLocation() const {user}=useUser() console.log console.log(location.pathname); return ( <>
{location.pathname == "/user" || location.pathname == "/dashboard" || location.pathname == "/order" || location.pathname == "/customer" || location.pathname == "/inventory" ? <> DashBoard Inventory Order Customer User {console.log("here")} : <> {console.log("here i am ")} }
) } export default HeaderPage;
